fields.headline: Something for the weekend: sunglasses
fields.bodyText: So far 2010 hasn't thrown up any sunglasses fads, and Lady Gaga's cigarette sunglasses are unlikely to catch on. Which means that basically anything goes – from classic aviators to tortoiseshell giants. The super-rich bulk buy – Donatella Versace reportedly spent $5,000 in one hit on sunglasses recently. We're not advocating that kind of nonsense, but if you favour high street sunnies, then what's wrong with having a couple of pairs? From top: Beige plastic from a selection, by Givenchy. Tortoiseshell £39, by Fabris Lane. Oversized tortoiseshell £4.99, by H&M. Square frames with silver bar £7.99, by H&M. Aviators £99, by Ray-Ban, from David Clulow.
